Text.Page:
Military tactics aren't my area of expertiseâ€”observing behavior is. Typical argon behavior oscillates between assimilation and elimination.

You see, they convert what they can control, and destroy what they cannot.

Their casual disregard here indicates they intend something else...plausibly something more sinister.

We require accurate information, and the mandrakes are more attuned to this land. Seek out Tanseril. Perhaps he can root out answers.

Shouldn't we rejoice? The argons passed us by!

You think they wanted something else?

You should go find out what Nila knows. She's probably got some information that will help us out.

The argons came through here and continued south. We tussled with them a bit, but they looked more interested in getting out than fighting our people.

Not sure if that helps, but that's what I know.
